recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

water 12 ounce
active dry yeast 2.25 tsp
sugar 0.125 tsp
archer flour 3.5 cup
Show Ingrendients

Estimated Time: 110 Minutes

Recipe:

Put warm 12 ounces water at 110 F into bowl and stir
Put 2¼ tsp active dry yeast in a bowl
Put ⅛ tsp sugar in the bowl
In another bowl put 3½ cups archer flour
Wait for yeast to get cloudy (Takes 20 minutes)
Pour yeast mixture into flour bowl and mix
Knead the dough about 7 times
Break dough in half and place in one in oiled red joesph containers (16oz) and the other in the mixing bowl.
Let dough rise (Takes 1.5 hours)
Break the pizza dough in half again
Either freeze the dough with olive oil around it or use it now for pizza
